mapper.select: /* DepositDdcMapper.getStoreTotalDtlList */ SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.MONEY_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS MONEY_DT, A.MONEY_FG, NVL((SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_HQ_NMCODE WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND NMCODE_GRP_CD = '133' AND NMCODE_CD = A.MONEY_FG), A.MONEY_FG) AS MONEY_FG_NM, A.MONEY_AMT, A.REMARK, (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_WB_USER_INFO_DTL_V01 WHERE USER_ID = A.REG_ID) AS USER_NM, A.MONEY_DATE, A.STORE_CD, A.SEQ_NO FROM TB_PO_HQ_STORE_MONEY A WHERE A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND A.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND A.MONEY_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY A.MONEY_DATE, A.SEQ_NO

/* USE : DepositDdcMapper.getMoneyFgCombo */ SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, NMCODE_GRP_CD, NMCODE_CD, PARENT_CD, NMCODE_NM, NMCODE_ITEM_1, NMCODE_ITEM_2, USE_YN FROM TB_HQ_NMCODE WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND NMCODE_GRP_CD = #{nmcodeGrpCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY NMCODE_CD
mapper.insert: /* DepositDdcMapper.insertDepositDdc */ INSERT INTO TB_PO_HQ_STORE_MONEY ( MONEY_DATE, STORE_CD, SEQ_NO, HQ_OFFICE_CD, MONEY_FG, MONEY_AMT, REMARK, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{moneyDate}, #{storeCd}, (SELECT TO_NUMBER(NVL(MAX(SEQ_NO), 0)+1) FROM TB_PO_HQ_STORE_MONEY WHERE MONEY_DATE = #{moneyDate} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd}), #{hqOfficeCd}, #{moneyFg}, #{moneyAmt}, #{remark}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
